description:
In this episode of our KinoCheck Originals you will learn everything we already know about the upcoming The Lord of the Rings: The Hunt for Gollum! |More ➤ https://KinoCheck.com/App #KinoCheckOriginals
"The Hunt for Gollum" will take place at the same time as "The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring", more specifically after Bilbo's birthday party and before the Mines of Moria. At the center is Gollum, once again played by Andy Serkis, who will also direct the film.

description:
It has been a turbulent week for all Marvel fans. Three new trailers found their way onto the internet. These included two for "Avengers: Doomsday" and now also a teaser for "Spider-Man: Brand New Day". We'll tell you what you can see in the teaser! While the "Avengers" leaks provide hardly any concrete clues about the plot, the "Spider-Man" trailer offers a surprising amount of insight – despite the poor image quality.
